guides.name: Hassan
guides.description: I am a native English speaker from England, I have lived all my life in budapest, Come join me on an adventure around the heart of the city of Budapest

guides.name: Zolt
guides.description: Hungarian middle-age man, Born, raised and breed in budapest, Won't it be great to get around the tourist attraction around the River side to Parliament building

guides.name: Henry
guides.description: Riding TIER scooter aroud the Buda castle have never been a bad idea, I am Roland, A US citizen who fell in love with this city, Let's have a fun filled tour around the castle
